name: Gravity (itch) (seanlucano)
description:
Switch gravity to find your way out of an abandoned space wreck back to your ship.!

This is a platformer prototype that replaces jumping with a gravity switch mechanic.   Along the way, you will need to find keycards to open doors, avoid drones, and radio-active waste. 

Future levels could include multiple keycards per room, other objects that manipulate gravity, or other objects or crew members that need to be retrieved before returning to your ship.
